title: Write a Year-in-Review Article
description: An editor needs to write a major feature article summarizing the most important news events of the past year.

tasks.description: Search the archive for the most significant stories published by the organization over the last 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of the year's top stories is compiled.

tasks.description: Group the stories by theme (e.g., Politics, Business, Culture) and outline a structure for the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: A logical structure for the year-in-review piece is created.

tasks.description: Draft the article, weaving the individual stories into a larger narrative about the year.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive and engaging summary of the year's events is written.
